Run Flongle flow cell with G4L2 to confirm library prep.

Again, will use 30 fmol input DNA and gentle negative pressure loading protocol (print-out in back of lab notebook)

G4L2 has avg sample length of 609bp, concentration of 22 ng/ml =\> 58.64 fmol/ul

$$
\frac{30fmol\ DNA}{5uL\ EB} \Rightarrow \frac{58.64fmol}{9.77uL}
$$

So mix **1ul G4L2** with (9.77ul-1) = **8.77ul EB** then use 5ul.

[**Flowcell**]{.underline}\
ID: AXT6SS\
82 pores on 09/01/25 check\
84 pores on 09/08/25 check\
50 pores after loading

Again, back to running on MKID.

[**Notes:**]{.underline}

-   Good occupancy on start though \~80% after 45min.

-   Already seeing accumulation of "unavailable" pores
